info.author: Ivan Furone
info.description:
Xmlfetch - Pythonic & Simple XML Generator

See LICENSE for licensing notes.

This piece of software comes handy when the necessity of generating XML code from 
scratch occurs,for example,being you in writing configuration options list for 
applications you use,or others you are coding on your own.

Depending on the time and fortune,and the amount of volunteering for this
project,updated versions may
be available in the future.
info.name: xmlfetch
info.html_description:
Xmlfetch - Pythonic & Simple XML Generator

See LICENSE for licensing notes.

This piece of software comes handy when the necessity of generating XML code from scratch occurs,for example,being you in writing configuration options list for applications you use,or others you are coding on your own.

Depending on the time and fortune,and the amount of volunteering for this project,updated versions may be available in the future.
